subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Bomber taunts victims from prison
Victims of Eric Rudolph, the anti-abortion extremist who pulled off a series of bombings, say he is taunting them from prison.

Vet beaten as onlookers watch
A 91-year-old World War II vet is beaten as onlookers watch. From WDIV. Viewer discretion advised. (May 13)
